data: Mississippi | Missouri | Saint Louis | Mound City
western bank of the Mississippi | embouchure of the Missouri | Saint Louis
On the western bank of the Mississippi, twelve miles below the _embouchure_ of the Missouri, stands the large town of Saint Louis, poetically known as the “Mound City.”
